LOCAL.prone.desc.label:
A Prone creature has all their speed's reduced by half, rounded up.

The creature's Melee and Accuracy are decreased by 1 step.

A creature attacking a Prone within Range 1 increases their Melee or Accuracy by 1.

A creature attack a Prone target at a distance greater than Range 1 decreases their Accuracy by 1 per 10 distance, rounded down.

SETTINGS.getCheckOptions.label: Ask for Check Options by default.
SETTINGS.getCheckOptions.hint: If true, an options dialog will pop-up when rolling a check. Hold Shift to toggle this setting.

SETTINGS.confirmDeletingItems.label: Confirm Deleting Items from Actors.
SETTINGS.confirmDeletingItems.hint: If true, a confirmation dialog will be displayed when attempting to delete an Item from an Actor. Can be suppressed by holding shift.

SETTINGS.autoOpenCharacterSheetsPlayer.label: Auto-Open Character Sheets (Player Only)
SETTINGS.autoOpenCharacterSheetsPlayer.hint: Configure whether to automatically open an owned character's sheet on their turn in combat. This setting only applies to Players.

SETTINGS.autoOpenCharacterSheetsGM.label: Auto-Open Character Sheets (GM Only)
SETTINGS.autoOpenCharacterSheetsGM.hint: Configure whether to automatically open an owned character's sheet on their turn in combat. This setting only applies to GMs.

SETTINGS.darkModeChatMessages.label: Dark Mode Chat Messages
SETTINGS.darkModeChatMessages.hint: Enable dark styling for chat messages.

SETTINGS.initiativeFormula.label: Initiative Formula
SETTINGS.initiativeFormula.hint: Optional formula to add to a character's Initiative rating during combat (default is +2d6).

SETTINGS.autoApplyFastHealing.label: Auto-Apply Fast Healing
SETTINGS.autoApplyFastHealing.hint: When enabled, combatants will automatically apply Fast Healing effects at start or end of their turn, depending on the effect. Show Button will instead display a confirmation button in the chat log.

SETTINGS.autoApplyPersistentDamage.label: Auto-Apply Fast Healing
SETTINGS.autoApplyPersistentDamage.hint: When enabled, combatants will automatically apply Persistent Damage effects at start or end of their turn, depending on the effect. Show Button will instead display a confirmation button in the chat log.

SETTINGS.autoRegainResolve.label: Auto-Regain Resolve
SETTINGS.autoRegainResolve.hint: When enabled, a combatant's resolve will automatically increase at the start of their turn. Show Button will instead display a confirmation button in the chat log.

SETTINGS.autoDecreaseEffectDuration.label: Auto-Decrease Effect Duration.
SETTINGS.autoDecreaseEffectDuration.hint: When enabled, a combatant's temporary effects will automatically decrease their duration by 1 at the start or end of their turn, depending on the effect.

SETTINGS.autoRemoveExpiredEffects.label: Auto-Remove Expired Effects
SETTINGS.autoRemoveExpiredEffects.hint: When enabled, expired effects will be automatically removed from a combatant at the start or end of their turn, depending on the effect. Show Button will instead display a confirmation button in the chat log.

SETTINGS.reportTakingDamage.label: Report Taking Damage
SETTINGS.reportTakingDamage.hint: Notify when an actor takes Damage.

SETTINGS.reportHealingDamage.label: Report Healing Damage
SETTINGS.reportHealingDamage.hint: Notify when an actor heals Damage.

SETTINGS.reportSpendingResolve.label: Report Spending Resolve
SETTINGS.reportSpendingResolve.hint: Notify when an actor spends Resolve.

SETTINGS.reportRegainingResolve.label: Report Regaining Resolve
SETTINGS.reportRegainingResolve.hint: Report when an actor regains Resolve at the start of their turn.

SETTINGS.reportEffects.label: Report Effects
SETTINGS.reportEffects.hint: Report an character's active Effects at the start of their turn.

SETTINGS.staminaMultiplier.label: Stamina Multiplier
SETTINGS.staminaMultiplier.hint: Base Stamina as a multiple of an character's Body + Mind + Soul.

SETTINGS.resolveMultiplier.label: Resolve Multiplier
SETTINGS.resolveMultiplier.hint: Base Resolve as a multiple of an character's Soul.

SETTINGS.woundsMultiplier.label: Wounds Multiplier
SETTINGS.woundsMultiplier.hint: Base Wounds as a multiple of an character's Body + Mind + Soul.

SETTINGS.baseWoundsRegain.label: Base Resolve Regain
SETTINGS.baseWoundsRegain.hint: This is the base value by which a combatant's Wounds will be healed when they take a Long Rest.

SETTINGS.baseResolveRegain.label: Base Resolve Regain
SETTINGS.baseResolveRegain.hint: When Auto-Regain Resolve is not disabled, this is the base value by which a combatant's Resolve will increase by at the start of their turn.
